Body: Possible Duplicate:  When will my device get the Android 4.0 update (Ice Cream Sandwich)?  i have Samsung galaxy s2 with android 2.3.6 and when i try update it with Kies to 4.0 (ice cream sandwhich) it shows that I9100XXKL1/I9100OXAKL1/I9100XXKL1/I9100XXKL1 (KOR) can't be updated. This is old phone, broken android or i should wait for update?
Title: Samsung galaxy S2 can't upgrade to 4.0

history.Text: i have Samsung galaxy s2 and when i try update it to 4.0 (ice cream sandwhich) it shows that I9100XXKL1/I9100OXAKL1/I9100XXKL1/I9100XXKL1 (KOR) can't be updated. This is old phone, broken android or i should wait for update?
